# Representative Body of the Batavian Republic (May-June 1798)

The Representative Body (May-June 1798) () was the legislative term between 4 May 1798 and 12 June 1798 Representative Body of the Batavian Republic. It was a continuation of the Constituent Assembly of the Batavian Republic after the adoption of the new constitution, the Staatsregeling 1798. The term ended after the coup d'Ã©tat of 12 June 1798 and was replaced by the Intermediary Legislative Body, which prepared the 1798 election for a new Representative Body.
